channel.title: Having a serious problem posting server
channel.description:
ok hi i need serious help cause i posted a friends server along time ago and now i made my own and i want to post it but the thing is that i cant cause it says you can only post one server. how do i make it so i can post my server?
please help me

item.title: Having a serious problem posting server
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

[quote=“natas9991134, post:1, topic:164623”]ok hi i need serious help cause i posted a friends server along time ago and now i made my own and i want to post it but the thing is that i cant cause it says you can only post one server. how do i make it so i can post my server?

please help me[/quote]

A useless poll, and the most non-serious “problem” I have ever seen, how is this so serious? If you would read on the Moparscape Server Status page;

This keeps servers in the database until their uptime drops below 40%.

That’s all you can do that I know of, so there’s the answer to your “serious” problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Having a serious problem posting server

item.title: Having a serious problem posting server
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You have to wait for your friend’s server’s uptime to drop below 40%.

Read full topic
